name: BananaClip
description: BananaClip Studios is transforming casual gaming (e.g., Candy Crush, Agario, Miniclip) by integrating classic games with blockchain technology, establishing a seamless global casual game economy powered by their token, BANA. Unlike inflationary Web3 gaming projects, BANA operates on a cyclical economy model instead of play-to-earn. Targeting the 25% of the global population who play casual games, BananaClip offers full Web2 accessibility and aims to simplify entry into DeFi for the extensive 2 billion player casual gamer market.
